p: The structure was solved by SHELXT [ 33] and then refined by SHELXL [ 42], both algorithms adopted in the Olex2 graphical user interface [ 43]. Carbon and oxygen atoms were refined anisotropically, while hydrogen atoms were positioned using SHELX angle-distance constraints and refined in riding approximation. Graphics were prepared with Mercury3.11 [ 44] and Jmol 14.6.4 [ 45].
